Paragraph: The PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer with thermal annealing gave a high PCE of 11.63% with a high V oc of 0.98 V and a J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 .

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer with thermal annealing gave a high PCE of 11.63% with a high V oc of 0.98 V and a J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSC (Perovskite Solar Cell) |
| Based on J91 / m-ITIC |
| Active layer |
| Thermal annealing |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| High (value for PCE) |
| V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) |
| High (value for V oc) |
| J sc (Short Circuit Current Density) |
| 18.03 mA cm^-2 (value for J sc) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSC (Perovskite Solar Cell) |
| Active layer (specifically J91 / m-ITIC) |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |

| Short Circuit Current Density (J sc) |

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer with thermal annealing gave a high PCE of 11.63% with a high V oc of 0.98 V and a J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |

| PCE of 11.63% |
| High V oc of 0.98 V |
| J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| PCE of 11.63% |
| V oc of 0.98 V |
| J sc of 18.03 mA cm^-2 |

These are the entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties with clear numerical values. The other entities do not provide specific values and therefore do not fit the criteria of "Property Value" entities.

* PSC based on J91 / m-ITIC as an active layer: This is a description of the material or structure, not a property value.
* gave: This is an action word and does not provide a property value.
* high: This is a descriptive word and does not provide a property value.
